title: Kaguya-sama: Love is War Official Doujin
description: "Kaguya Wants to Be Confessed to" is a manga about “the war of love and brains” between two high school geniuses who try to make the other confess. This, however, is an "ero spinoff" that’ll make you wish it were part of the main series!

altTitles.ja: かぐや様は告らせたい 同人版

altTitles.zh-hk: 輝夜姬想讓人告白 同人版

altTitles.en: Kaguya Wants to be Confessed to Official Doujin

altTitles.vi: Kaguya Muốn Được Tỏ Tình (Phiên Bản Doujinshi)
